options: rent  a beautiful flat of her own in happy valley
find another lady to share the cost to rent a flat
share her room in a flat with whoever has no pet
take on a maid to look after herself and the flat
call at 2521-6011 and see a beautiful park
questions: The one who put on the first ad probably wants to   _  .
According to the ads, you may   _  .
article:
*Share flats happy valley big flat, 1 room ready for use immediately. quiet and convenient, fully furnished, park view. $6, 800 including bills with maid. female nonsmoker. no pet. sara 25720836 or 10077809.
* moving sale 2 armchairs, red/brown at $400 each; coffee table, black, wood, $800; oil painting, big, $900; tianjin carpet, green 3x7, $600; double bed, $500; mirror, big, square, $500; fridge, big, double-door, $1000; old pictures, $140, up, each; plants, big and small. tel: weekend, 2521-6011/weekday, 2524-5867.
* part-time laboratory assistant wanted required by busy electronics  company to help with development of computer. should have an electronics degree and some practical experience of working in an electronics laboratory. hours 9:30 a.m.-1:00 p.m. mon.-fri. fourteen days paid leave. salary Y=6598-Y=10230 dependent on experience. letter of application to: mrs. g chan, nova electronics, 45 gordon rd, hung hom kowloon.
